original_text: All these people were still living by faith when they died. They did not receive the things promised; they only saw them and welcomed them from a distance, admitting that they were foreigners and strangers on earth.
korean_text: 이 사람들은 다 믿음을 따라 죽었으며 약속을 받지 못하였으되 그것들을 멀리서 보고 환영하며 또 땅에서는 외국인과 나그네임을 증언하였으니

sentences.original_text: All these people were still living by faith
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 사람들은 여전히 믿음으로 살았으며

sentences.original_text: They did not receive the things promised
and welcomed them from a distance

sentences.korean_translation: 자신들이 이 땅의 나그네인 것을 인정하며
